homePage.description: Discover events hosted by passionate fans, make new friends, and celebrate your favorite K-pop artists together.
homePage.join_favorite_groups: Join fellow fans and connect with communities dedicated to your favorite K-pop groups.
homePage.discover_event: Discover popular K-pop fan meetups and events
homePage.testimonialDescription: Join thousands of K-pop fans who have found their community through meetFans.
homePage.createProfile: Create your profile, connect with other fans, and start discovering K-pop events near you.

registerPage.title: Create an account

registerPage.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters long
registerPage.concent: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

footer.description: Connect with K-pop fans around the world and join exciting meetups.
